channel.title: sound on PraxisLIVE Unofficial Guide
channel.description: Recent content in sound on PraxisLIVE Unofficial Guide

item.title: Tutorial 3 - Audio-reactive visuals
item.description: Hello everybody! We’re getting to the final steps of this PraxisLIVE basic tutorial series! Today we’re about to see the “core” of this software: how to create audio on PraxisLIVE? How to make interact Processing visuals with an audio input? Let’s open as usual our project, but this time by also creating a new file (Audio Patch). Once done, you’ll see, like on video one when we created it, only the output node.
